abstract: A deal reached Thursday commits Exxon to spend about $1 billion looking for oil on the Black Sea coast, and holds the promise of sharing in the prize if it is discovered.
snippet: A deal reached Thursday commits Exxon to spend about $1 billion looking for oil on the Black Sea coast, and holds the promise of sharing in the prize if it is discovered.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW  Exxon Mobil once was poised to acquire a stake in Russia’s largest private oil company, only to have the deal fall apart when the Kremlin arrested the owner and the company went bankrupt.

headline.main: Despite Politics, Oil Companies Are Lured by Russian Petroleum
headline.print_headline: Despite Politics, Oil Companies Are Lured by Russian Petroleum
